alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 31 at 8:46PM CDT until April 03 at 3:51AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in La Crosse WI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Black River at Black River Falls affecting Jackson County. .The combination of heavy rain and snow melt will result in flooding along the Black River at Black River Falls. This river will go above the 47 foot minor flood stage late tonight. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING TO EARLY MONDAY MORNING... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD WATCH... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black River at Black River Falls. * WHEN...From Saturday morning to early Monday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 43.5 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage late tonight and rise to 49.9 feet early Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 47.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 49.9 feet on 06/23/2002. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 1100 AM CDT.
